name: jessamine
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a climbing plant with pleasant-smelling flowers: My house was surrounded by a kind of straggling hedge of jessamines and other flowers. We had lunch on the spacious verandah amid the scent of roses and jessamine.
More examplesFewer examplesConsider planting a few summer pots of lavender, or beautifully scented Mexican orange blossom, roses, or orange jessamine.Night-flowering jessamine blooms over an extended period.The faint scent of flowers hung in the air from the jessamine bushes nearby.
